html:
The weather in Smallenske

PhotoVideo
  • All news tapes
  • News
  • Country and world
  • Society
  • Sport
  • Business
  • Subscription
  • 100 years old!

Smolenska and the field. Main developments in the city

29 minutes ago
Vasili Anohin: In 2023, the national projects improved the quality of life of more than 85,000 moles
The completion of the construction of the school for 1,100 places in the Solova Rouge, the Queen and FOCA clinics in Schevka, the initiation of the oncodispenser and the relocation of 881 persons from emergency shelters is one of the main results of national projects...
Today, 13:23
Alexander Bastrekin took control of the beating situation of the SVR participant in Smallenske

The head of the investigative committee requested a progress report on the investigation of the criminal case. He's under an article for attempted murder.

Today, 12:45
Telephones of the " hotlines " that will work in Smallenska on holidays
Municipal services are organized in the Regional Centre. They will work from 23 to 26 February and from 8 to 11 March.
Today, 12:07
The programme for the celebration of Father ' s Day in Smallsk was known.
It will begin on 23 February with the solemnization of the flowers in the square of the Pamati Herauves, and will end with a celebrational salute, which will be launched from two points: the South and Spartacus airfield.
Today, 11:41
Smolene Export support center is the best in Russia!

The Russian Export Centre has identified TOP 10 regions on the effectiveness of supporting small and medium-sized exporters. As part of the follow-up to the regional centres in 2023, the leader among the 83 regions of Russia was the Smole region...

Today, 11:30.
In the Smole region, the arms smugglers were convicted
A 62-year-old resident of the Smolene region organized an illegal supply of firearms and ammunition from abroad. He was detained by FSB.
Today, 10:57
The Smolin oblast team went to the third interregional " House of Protectors "
The Tournament was organized by the " Protectors of the Fatherland " Foundation, the Paralympic Committee of Russia, the Government of Kaluz province and the All-Russian Federation of Sports of Persons, with the impact of the propulsion apparatus.
Today, 10:29
In Smolenska, criminal proceedings were initiated for beating a member of the SVR

The incident occurred on 19 February. This has come from social media stories.

Today, 09:53
Roads, PC, improvement. Vasili Anohin described the development of the Krasnin region
The Governor of Smolensk province visited the municipality with a work trip, during which he met the local population.
Today, 9:17
Smolone tried to remove acquaintances in court.

Now he might be on the defendant's bench. There's been a reason for a false statement.

Today, 08:40
In the Smole region, new rabies were identified

Governor Vasili Anohin signed the relevant decree of 19 February. The restrictions were placed in the Yartz district.

Today, 08:03
Smols are invited to the gala-concert of the song competition and the dance festival.
The organizers say it's a great way to diversify their leisure. Free entrance.
Today, 07:25
The intermediate stage of the sports project " Know what he was like! "
The best athletes in the areas are identified.
yesterday, 22:35
In the Smole region, the number of patients with RWI and high oral pressure increased

The statistic was divided by an ambulance station.

yesterday, 21:55
Two men were detained on suspicion of being slaughtered and killed in a smug centre

The incident occurred in October last year in the Yartz district. Criminal cases involving figures have been combined into one proceeding.

yesterday, 21:20
In the Smole region, migrants travelled at high speed

The following trailed FSBU team found a vehicle with damage to the trail. The incident occurred in the Monastery District.

yesterday, 20:05
In the Smolin province, the village in which command was accepted by the army was gasmed. Michael Kutuz

Smolensk gas distribution reported this. A new kilometre section of the gas pipeline in the Vyazem district was commissioned.

Yesterday, 19:25
Sozset: In Smallsk, a man slipped and broke his hip.

The incident occurred at home number 75 on Nikolaev Street. Witnesses shared information and personnel from the scene.

yesterday, 18:47
On 23 February, traffic will stop on the central streets of Smolensk
The Father's Day will be celebrated. Transport will be restricted for this time.

yesterday, 18:11.
Smolone on behalf of the police forgery documents

He managed to clean 13 million roubles. In the case of a man, a criminal case was filed under two articles. On 9 February, the Zednipro district court pronounced the verdict.
